nodes.text: I think the expansion of the EU is playing a part here.
So the figures may get worse before they get better
The best explanation of the worsening of the pollution figures in the EU is its expansion
New countries joining the EU have been operating with low environmental protection standards
it is not reasonable to expect them to bring their standards up to scratch quickly because of their (often damaged by bad government) poor infrastructures.
If new countries with low standars join the union the figures of the pollution will gel worse
